IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.change_equip_item_info') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.change_equip_item_info GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.change_equip_item_info @item_id dbo.id_t, @new_item_code dbo.code_t, @socket_count TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Inventories SET item_code = @new_item_code WHERE id = @item_id
UPDATE dbo.Equip_Item_Infos SET socket_count = @socket_count WHERE inventory_id= @item_id
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
